snippet.title: The Bearer and The Last Flame - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The Bearer and The Last Flame is a souls-like dark fantasy third-person action-adventure game developed by Dark Reaper Studio. Players will fight within a realm where death is rampant and they have been given the title of the bearer, the one who wields the last light of the world. As the carrier of the last flame, the player is dispatched to defeat the darkness of the five kingdoms and return the creatures and beasts to their realm of darkness. The Bearer and The Last Flame launches in 2024 for PlayStation 5 and PC.

#TheBearerAndTheLastFlame
